page.title: 15Community Services.
page.content: Mrs Lesley Smith is the Community Visitor in Belford this year.If Social Service funds are still available somebody else will be appointed next year.She visits 16 people at the moment,some living outside Belford at Mousen and Middleton,so a car is essential.Most people she visits are housebound so she shops for them, collects pensions and calls the doctor in if necessary. Belford has a Meals on Wheels service. The lunches are prepared in Bell View Old People's Home and are delivered by unpaid volunteers.There are also about 7 Home Helps who cover a large area surrounding the village. A chiropodist visits a centre in the village once a month.The patients are seen every 3 months.Those who are housebound are visited in their own homes.
